tha-ap414:3.4: sobhayantā mamassamaṁ → pupphanti mama assame (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap414:5.2: kokataracchakā → vakā … (bj, pts-vp-pli1, mr); bakā … (sya1ed, sya2ed)

tha-ap414:12.2: girimālettha → bhaginimālettha (bj, pts-vp-pli1); bhaginimālā ca (sya1ed, sya2ed)
